entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Android] Swapping out the content of a RefreshView breaks on Android #28361
    .NET 9 Servicing
  • [testing] Re enable some tests for visual comparison #28358
    .NET 10.0-preview3
  • [Android] Header and Footer Not Visible in CollectionView When EmptyView is Selected First #28351
  • PopToRootAsync results in a Deadlock #28344
  • C6_Refresh_View - Progress spinner is not disabled. #28343
  • `dotnet workload update` fails with the Android installer missing error after updating to .NET SDK v9.0.201 #28342
  • Scrolling performance will be slower when using remote iOS simulator from Windows machine. #28341
  • Error: There is no browser renderer with ID 3 #28339
  • CollectionView HeaderTemplate and FooterTemplate are not displayed when ItemsSource is initially set to null #28337
  • [Windows] EmptyViewTemplate not displayed when ItemsSource is initially set to a list and then set to Null #28334
  • Binding to dictionary with string key #28333

Closed

  • [regression/8.0.3] [iOS] Image layout issue in MAUI 8 (regression, worked correct in MAUI 7) #18983
  • [Android] CollectionView Footer Positioned Incorrectly #28350
  • ITMS-91061: Missing privacy manifest #28262

PullRequests

Created

  • [main] Check if RefreshControl is enabled on iOS #28365
  • [ci] Remove macios workaround to build net9 #28363
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, .NET 10.0-preview2
  • [nuget-msi-convert] Enable improved VS component IDs #28362
    do-not-merge, area-infrastructure
  • Check if RefreshControl is enabled on iOS #28360
  • [net10.0] Trimmable view handlers #28357
  • Make it safer to set TestCases.HostApp main page #28355
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-testing, community ✨
  • [Android][iOS] WebView Navigated event not triggered when using HtmlWebViewSource #28354
    platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-webview, partner/syncfusion
  • [Android] Fixed GraphicsView drawable is visible outside the canvas #28353
    platform/android 🤖, area-drawing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Windows] Add SingleSelectionFollowsFocus Platform Specific property #28352
    platform/windows 🪟, area-controls-collectionview, t/a11y
  • [net10.0] Merge main to net10 #28346
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, .NET 10.0-preview3
  • [Windows] WebView Navigated event is still called even after cancelling the Navigation. #28340
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, area-controls-webview, partner/syncfusion
  • [Windows] Upgrade Windows App SDK from 1.6.5 to 1.6.6 #28338
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨
  • [Windows] Fix for RadioButton BorderColor not working for Focused Visual State #28335
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, area-controls-radiobutton, partner/syncfusion
  • Fix: Support Clickable Hyperlinks in Labels with TextType HTML (iOS & Android) 2 #28331
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-label

Merged

  • [release/9.0.1xx-sr4] Revert "Fix FlyoutPage ShouldShowToolbarButton when overridden to return false, still shows button in title bar" #28232
    .NET 9 SR4.1
  • [release/9.0.1xx-sr4] [Android] Android: Native View not set exception on modal page - fix #28200
    .NET 9 SR4.1
  • [ci] Add net10.0 to triggers #28359
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Obsolete TableView #28302
    t/breaking 💥, area-controls-listview, .NET 10.0-preview2
  • [release/9.0.1xx-sr4] [HybridWebView] Properly managed response streams #28312
    .NET 9 SR4.1
  • [release/10.0.1xx-preview2] Obsolete TableView #28327
    .NET 10.0-preview2
  • [ci] Fix provisionator #28325
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [release/10.0.1xx-preview2] [ci] Fix platform for UItests for iOS #28345
  • [ci] Fix platform for UItests for iOS #28328
    area-testing, testing-green-ci, .NET 10.0-preview2

Updated

  • What if we did not use dictionaries? #28322
  • Fix for Shell does not always raise Navigating event on Windows #28315
    area-controls-shell, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Fix for CarouselView doesnot scroll corresponding to ItemsUpdatingScrollMode when collection modified #26608
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR6
  • Fixed crash in CollectionView on iOS when updating grouped data. #28133
    area-navigation, platform/iOS 🍎, p/0, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR6
  • [Windows] Fix select-all Entry select logic #23329
    platform/windows 🪟, area-controls-entry
  • Improve iOS CollectionView performance by leveraging the new platform level invalidation mechanism #28225
    p/0, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, t/perf, collectionview-cv2, .NET 9 SR6
  • [iOS] DatePicker | Remove unnecessary UpdateDate() call in UpdateTextColor() #27811
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-datetimepicker, partner/syncfusion/review, .NET 9 SR6
  • [Accessibility] Add Accessibility Traits to CollectionView items on iOS/Catalyst #27971
    platform/macOS 🍏, platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, t/a11y, collectionview-cv2, .NET 9 SR6
  • [iOS] Buttons with Gradient and ImageSource at the same time: ImageSource doesn't appear - UI Test #27572
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-button, .NET 9 SR6
  • Fix SafeArea management on iOS #28283
    platform/iOS 🍎, p/0, community ✨, .NET 9 SR6
  • [Android] Added Platform specific ripple color #23599
    proposal/open, community ✨, area-controls-button
  • [iOS] Add a done button to text fields #24645
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-entry
  • [iOS] DatePicker (Format='D') #24296
    community ✨, area-controls-datetimepicker
  • [HybridWebView] Refactor and convert the HybridWebView.js file into a TypeScript file #27183
    area-controls-hybridwebview
  • [iOS] Pasting long text when the editor has a max length #23877
    platform/macOS 🍏, community ✨, area-controls-editor
  • Fix NullReferenceException in PaintExtensions.IsSolid on Android (#28116) #28284
    .NET 9 SR4.1
  • Fixed content update issue when changing the ControlTemplate at runtime for a ContentPage #28216
    community ✨, area-controls-pages, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR6
  • [Android] ToolbarItem Icon Color #25102
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-toolbar, .NET 9 SR6
  • [iOS] Apply Shell.TitleColor to toolbar items #24985
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-toolbar, partner/syncfusion/review, .NET 9 SR6
  • Fix ImageButton not rendering correctly based on its bounds #28309
    community ✨, area-controls-button, partner/syncfusion
  • [iOS] Disabled animation for NavigationBar on initial display #27080
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-shell, do-not-merge, community ✨, .NET 9 SR6
  • [Android] CarouselView: Remove rounding from SizedItemContentView that results in off-by-one pixel error #25411
    platform/android 🤖, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion/review, .NET 9 SR6
  • [net10.0] Enable trimmer warnings #28015
    t/app-size, .NET 10.0-preview2
  • [Android] Fix Numeric Entry not accepting the appropriate Decimal Separator #27376
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-entry, partner/syncfusion
  • Fixed Keyboard Scrolling in editors with Center or End VerticalTextAlignment #25827
    community ✨, area-keyboard, area-controls-editor, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR6
  • [NET10.0] Fix parameter name for `ScrollViewerExtensions.UpdateScrollBarVisibility` #28255
    community ✨, .NET 10.0-preview3
  • Fixed - Grouped CollectionView items not rendered properly on Android, works on Windows #27847
    platform/android 🤖, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Fixed picker allows user input if the keyboard is visible #26382
    community ✨, area-controls-picker, partner/syncfusion
  • [Android / Windows] Fixed ListView.HasUnevenRows property run time changes #26882
    community ✨, area-controls-listview, partner/syncfusion
  • Fixed user interaction enabled in SearchBar when IsEnabled is false #27009
    community ✨, area-controls-searchbar, partner/syncfusion
  • [Windows] Fix for UI not updating GridItemsLayout when Span becomes 1. #26370
    platform/windows 🪟, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Fixed the Label text is cropped inside the border control with a specific padding value on certain Android devices #28259
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-label, area-controls-border, partner/syncfusion
  • WebView2CompositionControl support for BlazorWebView #28063 #28104
    area-blazor, community ✨
  • [Windows] Fixed Horizontal Spacing for Horizontal List #28311
    platform/windows 🪟, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Fixed Editor HorizontalTextAlignment does not update at run time #25129
    platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-editor, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 Servicing
  • [Windows] Fix for FontImageSource color is not applied to the Tab Icon on the TabbedPage #26888
    area-controls-tabbedpage, community ✨, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR6
  • [Android] CV RemainingItemsThresholdReachedCommand fires on initial data load - fix #28321
    platform/android 🤖, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨
  • Fix for border color of the RadioButton is visible in Windows #28214
    community ✨, area-controls-radiobutton, partner/syncfusion
  • [iOS] Fix for CarouselView ItemSpacing property in ItemsLayout not working with CV2 #27056
    community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Windows] Fix for FlyoutItem in overflow menu not fully interactable #27575
    community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Pickers Inside CollectionView get SelectedItem Cleared on Scrolling - FIX #26775
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-picker
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #28203
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-infrastructure
